thread.section_title: Hotel Crayon by Elegancia - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fabulous Service & Beautiful Hotel -
thread.title_full: Fabulous Service & Beautiful Hotel - Review of Hotel Crayon by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: jessica3315
title: Fabulous Service & Beautiful Hotel -
text:
I travelled with a friend to run the semi de Paris this month and stayed at Hotel Crayon. The staff were incredibly helpful and went above and beyond to accommodate us after a very cold and wet couple of hours running.
Exemplary customer service throughout our stay, thank you.
Great food, lovely room and a fabulous place to stay.
I would highly recommend Hotel Crayon to anyone travelling to Paris.
